turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I was wanting to go and try this new pizza place called Bella Luna's. Can you tell me what kind of things they offer on their menu?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, they have several specialty pizzas as well as build your own pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you name them all for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, they have the meat lovers, veggie lovers, supreme and hawaiian pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Do they sell anything besides pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: they also have sides such as breadsticks and wings.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they offer anything to drink like 2 L?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, they also sell soda.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, well thank you. There's been a lot of help. Well let's take what I'm looking for. I think I'm going to order four small pizzas. Now I want these four small pizzas, I want three of them to be meat lover pizzas. And then, I think I'll take one veggie lover also. And, I would want the crust on these pizzas to be thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, and sides or drinks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. I think I'll pass on them.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Will just take the four pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Four smalls.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so you are ordering 4 small thin crust pizzas, 3 meat lovers and 1 veggie lovers.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, ma'am.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $52, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will you be picking up, having it delivered or dining in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take whatever is delivered.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, please note that your total does not include tip.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be delivered in 40 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will. You have a good day.
